text: The Chevrolet Tahoe (and its sibling GMC Yukon) is a full sized SUV sold by General Motors since 1995. It replaced the Chevrolet K5 Blazer and GMC Jimmy. It is available in three trims LS, LT, and LTZ. The Tahoe comes in either rear-wheel drive or four-wheel drive. It also offers FlexFuel (can burn gasoline or mixes of gasoline and ethanol up to E85). The Tahoe is available with a choice of automatic or manual transmission and has a V8 engine. The Tahoe is built on the same chassis used by full-sized Chevrolet and GMC pickup trucks. It is also offered to police fleets as the "Chevrolet Tahoe Police Package". == References == Category:General Motors vehicles Category:Sport utility vehicles Tahoe Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Chevrolet Tahoe
